ch.aplu.util

Class HtmlPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.util.HtmlPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinkListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class HtmlPane
extends java.lang.Object
implements LinkListener
    Simple graphics window similar to GPanel to be used for displaying HTML formatted text. Only a subset of HTML is supported. Image loading from image tag is supported as follows:
    insertUrl(): subdir/pict.gif: loading from internet, subdir of html
    http://...: loading from internet, absolute URL
    insertFile(): subdir/pict.gif: loading from subdir of html on disk
    file://path: fully qualified path to disk image file
    http://.,. . loading from internet, absolute URL
    insertResource: subdir/pict.gif: loading from subdir of html from JAR archive
    http://.,. : loading from internet, absolute URL
    insertText(): http://...: loading from internet, absolute URL
    file://path: fully qualified path to disk image file

      • HtmlPane

        public HtmlPane()
        Construct a HtmlPane with default size and position.

      • HtmlPane

        public HtmlPane(Position position,
        Size size)
        Construct a HtmlPane with given position and size. The default position and size is selected from packagedoc.properties.
        Parameters:
        position - a reference to a Position object
        size - a reference to a Size object

    • Method Detail

      • insertText

        public void insertText(java.lang.String text)
        Insert HTML formatted text. The old text is erased. A relative path in html images tags are assumed to start from the current working directory.
        Parameters:
        text - the html text to show

      • insertResource

        public void insertResource(java.lang.String filename)
        Insert HTML formatted text from the given file in a JAR resource. The old text is erased.
        Parameters:
        filename - the path of the JAR resource text file relative to the application root

      • insertFile

        public void insertFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Insert HTML formatted text from the given file. The old text is erased.
        Parameters:
        filename - the qualified or relative path to the html text file

      • insertUrl

        public void insertUrl(java.lang.String htmlUrl)
        Insert HTML from given URL. The old text is erased.
        Parameters:
        htmlUrl - an URL string like http://www.aplu.ch/index.html" to the html text file

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Show the given title in the title bar. The default title is selected from packagedoc.properties.
        Parameters:
        title - the new title to show

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Erase all text.

      • addExitListener

        public void addExitListener(ExitListener exitListener)
        Register an ExitListener to get a notification when the close button is clicked. After registering the automatic termination of the application is disabled. To terminate the application, System.exit() should be called.
        Parameters:
        exitListener - the ExitListener to register

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Hide the console window.

      • isDisposed

        public boolean isDisposed()
        Return true, if the HtmlPane window was disposed.

        Calls the standard system browser
        Parameters:
